overview: Italy's Mussolini sends his strongest Graciani commanders to quell the forces of Omar al-Mukhtar, who defeated them in several battles. But after the arrival of Graziani to Benghazi sends the first combat team, but defeated and then opens the doors of the prison and sends Deodecchi to negotiate with Omar Mukhtar but Omar Mukhtar later discover that Graciani wanted time to catch his breath and actually Graziani brought his supplies of tanks to the desert and managed to occupy infidels and fell glasses of my life Chosen in one of the battles later
title: اسد الصحراء
